name: LoggingErrorHandler

fields.name: logFunctionalErrors
fields.documentation:
Whether to log {@link FunctionalException}s at {@code WARN} level. Technical errors are always logged at
 {@code ERROR}.

constructors.name: LoggingErrorHandler
constructors.documentation: Constructs a {@code LoggingErrorHandler} that logs both technical and functional errors.

methods.name: handleError
